message.content: It is important to note that opinions on abortion can vary among individuals, and it would be incorrect to assume a single opinion represents the entire male population in Portugal. However, in Portugal, public opinion on abortion tends to be quite divided, with differing views among men as well. While some men support a woman's right to choose and believe that abortion should be legal and accessible, others may hold more conservative views and oppose it on moral or religious grounds. Overall, it is essential to recognize that perspectives on abortion in Portugal, as in any society, are influenced by personal beliefs, cultural backgrounds, and individual experiences.
